title: Update a BigQuery connection
description: Updates the friendly name or description for an existing BigQuery connection. This method uses a field mask to specify which fields to change.

objective.narrative: A developer needs to programmatically update metadata for a BigQuery connection, such as changing its friendly name to match a new project naming convention or updating its description with new contact information. Using a field mask ensures that only the specified fields are changed, which prevents accidental modification of other important settings.

regionTags.name: bigqueryconnection_v1_connectionservice_connection_update
regionTags.title: Update a BigQuery connection
